transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Yeah, good afternoon sir. Shivani this side from IndiaMART.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Yes sir actually I have received a ticket from your side. Please share me the your issues once.
Customer: Shivani you are my new manager?
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: You are my manager?
Executive: No, I am not your manager actually. Hello.
Customer: Uh you are Mega from IndiaMART, okay?
Executive: Yeah, I'm also working in IndiaMART.
Customer: Uh okay and uh I have a manager sitting with Meena, right? Last time it was uh Bhanu and now when I'm checking the site, there is another lady. I have requested many call back and she is not responding.
Executive: Actually she is very new. Uh that's why she is not uh Thank you for understanding my problem. At least the manager should respond.
Executive: Okay, okay. So please make it ASAP, okay? Because I have some serious requirements and all.
Executive: Okay. So tell me sir what are you facing in IndiaMART?
Customer: No, currently I want some product acquisitions and I want a reseller. I want a I have to find a manufacturer for 85 GSM non woven bag in a specific size, 5000 quantity. That's an option order.
Executive: Okay, okay. So can we arrange a video meeting then then we will discuss to explain our morely.
Customer: Why a video meeting for them for that?
Executive: Because I check the catalog if you have any issues then I will check on your behalf.
Customer: No, I want I want a trusted supplier for non woven bag. That is the first thing. Then we can go for the product preparation.
Executive: Okay, okay. I see Bhanu Bhanu was very helpful for me. She always find good supplies and all.
Executive: Actually Bhanu is promoted.
Customer: Oh. He is a senior account manager.
Executive: Okay, fine. Then give me another manager.
Executive: Yeah sir. she is name is Anshika Anshika Mishra. She also joined the India Mart last week one week.
Customer: Hmm. So so she did not India Mart process.
Customer: Okay. So what will I do? Have to do the things now. So what will I do? I have to get the I will help you. I will help you sir. I will help you.
Customer: Okay, you will help me.
Executive: Yes sir, yes sir. Okay, this number have a WhatsApp. My requirement is 15 into 12 into 4 size.
Executive: 15 and 12. 15 into 12 into 4 in this size 85 GSM non woven black color plain bag.
Executive: Okay. please share me your WhatsApp number sir.
Customer: Uh this is the thing. Uh you can put your all details on WhatsApp then I will easily share the on details on your WhatsApp.
Customer: Okay, fine.
Executive: please share me the WhatsApp number.
Customer: Sorry?
Executive: Please share me the WhatsApp number.
Customer: 995.
Executive: 995
Customer: 26
Executive: 26 01
Executive: 01 93
Executive: 93. Yes.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Then I what I have to do next?
Executive: I'm uh I'm sharing the hi message. You can put the all details on WhatsApp.
Customer: Okay, fine, fine.
Executive: I will share it now, okay?
Executive: Okay, sir. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- New manager not responding to calls.

- Wants a trusted supplier for non-woven bags.

- Needs product acquisitions and a reseller.



Resolution:

- Executive assured help in finding a supplier.

- Customer shared WhatsApp number for further communication.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share details on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- manager, non-woven bags, supplier, whatsapp
